sentences.sContent: But until now, no trials have been statistically powered to address effects on survival.
sentences.sContent_eng: But until now, no trials have been statistically powered to address effects on survival.
sentences.sCn: 但是直到现在，没有试验能在统计学上有力的标明它对生存率的影响。

sentences.sContent: I mean think of it this way, you and me, we are only statistically expected to live around 28,470 days.
sentences.sContent_eng: I mean think of it this way, you and me, we are only statistically expected to live around 28,470 days.
sentences.sCn: 我的意思是，从这个方面思考你我之间，统计意义上说我们的寿命只有大约28，470天。

sentences.sContent: Because surely you value empirical evidence over all, and the data say the girls there are statistically most likely to put out.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because surely you value empirical evidence over all, and the data say the girls there are statistically most likely to put out.
sentences.sCn: 因为你们可以全面地评估实验证据，而且据统计数据显示，历史系的女生最有可能主动出击。

words.tran: 统计；统计学；[统计] 统计资料
